document.full_text: americans rank the use of performance-enhancing drugs as the most serious problem facing sports today, according to a poll released by the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) on tuesday.
document.title: americans say drug use is top problem in sports: poll
lines_and_colors: americans rank the use of performance-enhancing drugs as the most serious problem facing sports today, according to a poll released by the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) on tuesday.
